Text: Fw Wedding Date Original Message From Grigsby Mike Mike NRONcom To Sent Thursday September PM Subject FW Wedding Date Original Message From Chase Belew mailto Sent Thursday August AM To Drew and Shelby Anderson John Tamny Becky Belew Blake Benton Brad Beckel Carter Carl Chad Pierce Danner and Tracy Bethel Dave Page David Bethel Denise Bethel Donald R Bethel Greg Parr Guthrie Shavor Hans Brindley Jason Russell Jeff Haley Beckel Jeff Cameron Jeff Markey Kari Pierce Kevin Kerr Lisa and Brian Fahey Matt Belew Matt Hawkins Grigsby Mike Mitch Watson Mom Robert Elms Robert Moseley Scott Stacy Richardson Tim Moriarty Troy MacMane Brian Pierce Brian McCabe Subject Wedding Date Leah and I have settled on April th as the wedding date and San Miguel de Allende Mexico as the place We will be sending out a Save the Date notice and a website link with more information including the schedule travel options accommodations and stuff to do in SM I just wanted to give everyone a heads up We look forward to seeing all of you there Chase Home Mobile This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Fw planMessage Original Message From John W McCollum To Mike Courtney Grigsby Sent Saturday November AM Subject RE plan Sounds good I called the other day to find out what URL you use for the streaming Bloomberg TV screen you have at your desk Can you email it to me Original Message From Mike Courtney Grigsby mailto Sent Wednesday November PM To Subject Re plan John Thank you for the spreadsheet I will sit down and plug in my numbers after Thanksgiving Have a nice weekend Talk to you soon Mike Grigsby Original Message From John W McCollum To Sent Monday November PM Subject plan Mike here is the spreadsheet I have used You need to fill in the cells in yellow for starting values the spreadsheet calculates the rest You can also change the assumptions at the top blue cells Mortgage expenses are captured in line but do not include taxes and insurance just PI Make sure to include taxes and insurance in general annual expenses line Just take a look and fill it in as well as you can and we can talk about any questions you have John W McCollum Heritage Trust Company Northwest Expressway Suite Oklahoma City OK fax
